changeSet.author: jhmoreno
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE [Categoria] ( [Id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY, [EstadoRegistro] char(10) NULL, [CreadoPor] varchar(255) NULL, [FechaCreacion] smalldatetime NULL, [ModificadoPor] varchar(255) NULL, [FechaModificacion] smalldatetime NULL, [EliminadoPor] varchar(255) NULL, [FechaEliminacion] smalldatetime NULL, [Nombre] varchar(255) NOT NULL, [Alias] varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', [Codigo] varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', CONSTRAINT [PK_Categoria] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]) );
GO
